<noinclude>
This template creates a note/info box for highlighting important information.

== Usage ==
<pre>
{{Note|Your note text here}}
</pre>

== Parameters ==
* '''1''' - The note text (required)

[[Category:Templates]]
</noinclude><includeonly><div class="df-admonition df-note">
'''ℹ️ Note:''' {{{1}}}
</div></includeonly>
